Message.Title: Low volume ??? Do to slow accumulation in the market
Message.Msg: by Hedge Funds and big banks ? Are the computers are working in slow motion buying up cheap shares with out desterbing the volume ?? We all know the big rally is coming soon ? We just dont know what will happen after Nov 4th

Topic.Title: US GDP 1.5% market up 100% in last 3 years

Message.Msg: "I guess we need a strong breather....AAPL at $662 topping & AT&T want to stop subsidize tablets....lol" AT&T dropping iPad subsidies for cell contracts, following VZ's lead, is a sign of strength of New iPad sales and not AAPL or T weakness at all. AAPL can't seem to make them fast enough because everywhere they are sold the inventories are lean -- you hear that on hold if you call a Best Buy, and T & VZ concluded that demand was so strong at full price that they were leaving money on the table with iPad subsidies. After the iPhone 5 they may also adjust subsidies down. You can LOL all you want. You don't get it.

Topic.Title: Buffett Likes IBM More Than INTC

Message.Msg: IBM has pricing power...INTC does not
